subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Milwaukee Brewers have a tentative agreement on a one-year contract with the free-agent outfielder Mike Cameron, pending a physical, Major League Baseball’s Web site said. Brewers General Manager Doug Melvin said Cameron, 35, would start in center field. Cameron will be suspended the first 25 games of the season without pay for testing positive for a banned stimulant.
